ai-ja358:1.4_0: I had the elephant cut off my hands,
ai-ja358:2.1_0: I’m a long way to give,
ai-ja358:2.4_0: Majesty, the gods cut off their feet,
ai-ja358:3.1_0: I’m a long way to give,
ai-ja358:4.3_0: Those who say that the King is not good.
ai-ja358:4.4_0: Don’t let a killer or a child.
ai-ja358:5.3_0: Those who say that the King is not good.
ai-ja358:5.4_0: Do not have killed or sons.
ai-ja358:6.1_0: along with paths that are profound,
ai-ja358:6.2_0: Their shunning out of the Dhamma
ai-ja358:6.3_0: he was the heir to the earth:
ai-ja358:7.1_0: The eighth section on the eighth earthquakes.
